name: BlockPort
description:
This is my first game I've ever made. Started learning a month ago and this is the result. Jazz Theme, relaxing game with medium levels, not easy, not hard. Hope you will enjoy this!

  • At the moment, I only created 3 levels, but more are about to come!

Credits to the tile set and the background, created by InanZen! This game looks incredible just thanks to InanZen's background, so thank you a lot :)

Link to the tileset:https://opengameart.org/content/breakout-set
